widget.name: Advice Owl
widget.description: Read all your favorite advice columns in one app. Advice Owl gathers the latest articles from several of the most popular advice column RSS feeds, including Dear Prudence, Ask Amy, and Savage Love. The results are displayed for you in one convenient page, sorted by date. Satisfy your need for love, relationship, etiquette, work, and dating advice, all in one place!
widget.author: Drake Emko
